item.title: Self-questioning:Econ-Learning mentality within the hierarchy of disdain
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Reflecting on the attitude towards the study of economics—what constitutes enthusiasm? What embodies a love for the discipline? Documenting my own hierarchy of disdain in the realm of economic learning.

item.title: Faces of Time
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The process of stylistic evolution in character portrayal is akin to the process of human self-awareness. The thematic exhibition titled “Faces of Time” encapsulates this sentiment aptly.Whether it is the subject matter or the techniques employed in painting, they are essentially products of human quest for understanding in the waves of time

item.title: watching in 2024 : Various Approaches to Coexisting with Fate
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: GPT:This passage explores various perspectives on fate through the analysis of different works, including “Blossoms Shanghai,” “The Long Season,” “Only the River Flows,” and “Journey to the West (sff).” It delves into how individuals reconcile with fate, highlighting themes of acceptance, madness, and awakening. Ultimately, it suggests that coexisting with fate entails maintaining a positive attitude towards survival and finding compromise or acceptance of the inevitable.

item.title: HOW TO SLAY A DRAGON
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: GPT:In the realm of medieval fantasy, “How to Slay a Dragon” offers a whimsical journey through the Middle Ages, blending history with humor and adventure. While it may lack in-depth historical analysis, the book captivates readers with witty anecdotes and everyday insights into medieval life. Through its quirky storytelling and playful tone, it invites readers to explore the fascinating world of history through a fantastical lens.

item.title: HLT: Lifecycle and Wage Decomposition
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: GPT:The text discusses the decomposition of wages throughout individuals lifecycles using the APC (Age-Period-Cohort) panel model and the Heckman-Lochner-Taber (HLT) approach. The Mincer earnings function forms the basis for this analysis, focusing on the relationships between education level, work experience, and wages. However, traditional decompositions face challenges due to collinearity between age, birth year, and current year. Deatons method addresses this by isolating time and cohort effects, allowing for separate analysis. The HLT approach further dissects wage growth, suggesting that as individuals near retirement, wage growth is primarily influenced by the time effect rather than human capital investment. This comprehensive approach aims to better understand wage dynamics over the course of individuals lives, incorporating factors such as education, work experience, age, and cohort effects.

item.title: The Custom Font in Hugo
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The method to customize fonts in each Hugo theme varies, and there are few resources online explaining how to modify fonts in Hugo. Here, we will introduce how to change fonts in the LoveIt theme.

item.title: The Hexi Corridor
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The Hexi Corridor, truly formidable, unfolds its rugged terrain. The Qilian Mountains, with their majestic peaks and ridges, reveal the lean loess skin weathered over ages, adorned with streaks of black and red hues. The mountain summits swell like vertebrae, encircling the narrow passage with a slow, imposing embrace.

item.title: The Mogao Grottoes aspire to be more than mere tourist attractions
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: GPT:This article discusses the value of the Mogao Grottoes, pointing out that they are not just tourist attractions, but also a scientific and educational endeavor. The article describes the history and cultural characteristics of the Mogao Grottoes, as well as their appeal to tourists, emphasizing their unique cultural atmosphere and historical significance. Finally, the article notes that the existence of the Mogao Grottoes is not only a symbol of religion, but also a continuously evolving historical and cultural heritage.
